metadata.dc:author: Costa, C
metadata.dc:title: Prehistoria de la cátedra de histología de la Universidad de Chile (1872-1881) Parte II. Microscopio e histología en Chile antes de 1873.
[Historical notes on the teaching chair of histology at the University of Chile School of Medicine (1872-1881). Part II. Light microscopy and histology in Chile before 1873 (author's transl)].
